text:
Series Apple TV + while watching 20 times less than the latest Netflix
06 Nov 2019, 17:12 by Ilya Sidorov
Apple TV + launched on November 1, but until now it was unclear how popular this service turned out to be.
Analysts at Parrot Analytics found that the Apple TV + series watched a lot less than the premieres of Netflix, Hulu, CBS and YouTube Premium.
The Morning Show is nearly 20 times behind Dark Crystal: The Age of Resistance. Apple's most popular film was See with Jason Momoa in the title role.



The results of the study are based on discussions in social networks, so its reliability is in doubt.
Topic: Overview of the Apple TV + service and its series. Have something to see?
Many users have not yet had time to use Apple TV +. Some are waiting for the company to post all the series of series, and someone else has not set up the application on the TV.
There are no official data on Apple TV + views. They are likely to appear in January next year, when the first fiscal quarter ends. [9to5Mac]
